title: Moragoda meets with Chief Minister Stalin
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The High Commissioner of Sri Lanka to India, MilindaMoragoda has met with the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu, M.K. Stalin today (4) in Chennai.
The two dignitaries have discussed ways and means to further strengthen relations between Tamil Nadu and Sri Lanka.

The Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu recently stated that the Prime Minister of India, Narendra Modi should reclaim the Kachchatheevu island, stating that it is an opportunity to ensure the traditional fishing zone and rights of the Tamil Nadu fishing community.
